data.title: Cinematic Wedding & Event Videographer Serving DC, MD, VA Regions.
data.meta_description: nVu Films - Washington DC | Maryland | Virginia Cinematic Wedding and Event Videographer / Cinematographer. Proudly serving DC, MD, VA (DMV) Regions. Candid and creative videography / cinematography in DC, Maryland, Virginia.
data.text:
nVu Films is a luxury wedding filmmaking brand located in the DC, Maryland, Virgina region.

Owner Vu Nguyen is a husband, father of two beautiful children, and an award winning filmmaker. He began experimenting with filmmaking and video editing in 2014, but has been involved with various visual art mediums since the age of 5. This includes studio art, drawing, painting, sculpting, and photography. Naturally, this translates to his creativity in cinematography. He left his 10 year accounting career to pursue videography full-time, and has built a boutique wedding film brand that is known all over the world. Beyond being passionate about the artistry, he is also dedicated to bringing outstanding customer service to all clients.

With nVu Films, you deal with a person, not a "company" or "corporation". Vu Nguyen will get to know you, be laid back and easy to work with, but also SERIOUS with his cinematography. He is detail oriented and quick to respond to your inquiries via email, text, phone, snail mail, etc. Every film by nVu Films is uniquely crafted by Vu Nguyen. With nVu Films, you know what you are getting. Unlike many videography companies that book unlimited weddings and send out random videographers to film your wedding, you know Vu will show up and film your wedding. nVu Films only books limited weddings annually to be able to invest time to properly craft your love story. nVu Films believes that style is a crystallization. A crystal is in it's final form. It cannot change, it cannot evolve, it cannot adapt. No single person is the same, no couple is the same, therefore no wedding is the same. We have to be able to evolve and adapt to you to be able tell a story that is as unique as you are. With nVu Films, you know you will get an authentic, consistent, and passionately individually crafted wedding film. Your wedding is unique, your wedding film should be as well.

Feel free to contact with any questions, inquiries, etc. He will get back to you asap!

As a luxury film studio we take on limited bookings. Dates fill up quickly so please reach out at your earliest convenience.

nVu Films proudly serves the DC, MD, VA and all over the world.

nvu films youtube channel
